News

  07. March 2023

Ribocentre updated to v1.5, thanks the sequence search function from RNAcentral.

  30. Sept 2022

Ribocentre database paper online, please see the link Nucleic Acids Research, gkac840, https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gkac840.

  28. July 2022

Ribocentre updated to v1.4, add 3D dynamic interactive visualization.

  18. July 2022

Ribocentre updated to v1.3, add 2D dynamic interactive visualization.

  25. June 2022

Ribocentre updated to v1.2, add Catalysis section.

  12. June 2022

Ribocentre updated to v1.1, add Applications section.

  1. June 2022

Ribocentre database v1.0 version online.
